channel.title: Good songs to play on an Acoustic guitar?
channel.description:
Sup mitb, 3 days ago I bought an acoustic guitar to help me with some music coursework. The guitar is an ARIA, I don't know much about makes, I only bought it because it was nice to play in the store and it was around my price range.
Anyways I haven't been able to put it down, i've fallen in love with strumming some chords and singing, makes me feel very tranquil. The question I put to you guys is what songs are good to play like that?
So far i've been playing;
Birds - Kate Nash Your guardian angel - The red jumpsuit Tears in heaven - Eric Clapton Drunken lullabies - Flogging molly The velorium camper I: Faint of hearts - Coheed and cambria
So any other fun songs to play? I'd like songs that are easy to just strum the chords and sing the melody, or even like "Tears in heaven" just have a really nice melody which is quite simple to play.
Thanks.

item.title: Good songs to play on an Acoustic guitar?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:3, topic:190613”]OH-MY-SCIENCE!
Thank you for reminding me about Time of your life!

My school had to sing it in year 8 and its one of my favourite songs.

Will take a look at the others too[/quote]

No problem.
The chicks dig a man who can play a 3 chord song ‘flawlessly’.
lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Good songs to play on an Acoustic guitar?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Banana Pancakes - Jack Johnson.
Easy, and catchy.

Times like these - foo fighters (?)

Time of your life (good riddance) - Green day

Depends how good you are too. Some good clasical pieces (non-lyrical) are always fun.

Read full topic
